channel.title: Talks and Posters on Cecina Babich Morrow
channel.description: Recent content in Talks and Posters on Cecina Babich Morrow

item.title: [Talk] From climate risk to action: Analysing decision robustness under uncertainty
item.description: 2nd place talk of RSC 2025 ðŸ¥ˆ

item.title: [Talk + Poster] From risk to action: Climate decision-making under deep uncertainty
item.description: Uncertainty and sensitivity analysis of BDA applied to an idealised example of heat stress mitigation.

item.title: [Poster] Sensitivity of Bayesian Decision Analysis: A tool for robust climate adaptation decision-making
item.description: Uncertainty and sensitivity analysis of BDA applied to an idealised example of heat stress mitigation.

item.title: [Poster] Sensitivity of Bayesian Decision Analysis: A tool for robust climate adaptation decision-making
item.description: Uncertainty and sensitivity analysis of BDA applied to an idealised example of heat stress mitigation.

item.title: [Poster] Sensitivity of Bayesian Decision Analysis: A tool for robust climate adaptation decision-making
item.description: Uncertainty and sensitivity analysis of BDA applied to an idealised example of heat stress mitigation.

item.title: [Talk] Bayesian Decision Analysis: a crash course
item.description: Lightning talk introducing BDA via a toy example.

item.title: [Talk] Sensitivity of Bayesian Decision Analysis to decision attributes: A tool for robust climate adaptation decision making
item.description: Uncertainty and sensitivity analysis of BDA applied to an idealised example of heat stress mitigation.

item.title: [Talk] Bayesian Decision Analysis for climate decision-making: Sensitivity to decision attributes
item.description: Investigating the sensitivity of BDA to changes in cost-related decision attributes for an idealized example.

item.title: [Talk] Bayesian Decision Analysis for climate decision-making
item.description: Sensitivity of BDA in an idealised example of heat-stress.

item.title: [Talk] The Use of Utility: Utility functions in a Bayesian Decision Analysis framework
item.description: My presentation for the Bootcamp unit of the Compass PhD program.

item.title: [Outreach] Sad strategies: making really bad ideas work for you
item.description: Outreach talk as part of Biology on Tap, a monthly event for biology popular science talks.

item.title: [Talk] Delineating parapatric ranges using species distribution models and support vector machines: An example with three-toed sloths (Bradypus)
item.description: Applying support vector machines to refine range estimates for three species of Bradypus.

item.title: [Poster] Improving species range estimates for an arboreal species group with a parapatric distribution
item.description: Using support vector machines to mask out biotically unsuitable areas improves species range estimates for Bradypus.

item.title: Talk: Using SVMs to delineate parapatric ranges: An example with three-toed sloths (Bradypus)
item.description: Applying support vector machines to incorporate biotic information into range estimates for three species of Bradypus.

item.title: [Outreach] Big vs. Small: Using ratios to compare life history strategies
item.description: Outreach talk for high school students in the first year of the Brown Scholars program to start off their unit on paleoneurobiology.

item.title: [Talk] Using SVMs to model ranges of congeneric sloth species
item.description: Incorporating biotic information to guide range estimates of three species of Bradypus.

item.title: [Outreach] STEM careers in museums
item.description: Outreach talk to Los Angeles LGBT Youth Center talking about my work at AMNH.

item.title: [Talk] Macroevolution of dimensionless life history metrics in tetrapods
item.description: Biology Senior Honors presentation on dimensionless life history metrics across the major classes of tetrapods.

item.title: [Poster] Macroevolution of dimensionless life histories in amniotes
item.description: Investigating the evolution of dimensionless life history traits across amniotes.

item.title: [Poster] Quantifying species tolerances and functional diversity using n-dimensional hypervolumes: a comparison of methods
item.description: Poster comparing different hypervolume methods for ecological applications.
